text: Di madagoaa deelaa, gei au gaa hana e heetugi gi Shemaiah, tama ni Delaiah, dono damana madua go Mehetabel. Mee e deemee di hana gi daha mo dono hale, gei mee ga helekai mai, “Gidaua gaa hula gaa pala hagammuni i di Gowaa Dabu i lodo di Hale Daumaha, gaa tai nia bontai di Hale Daumaha, idimaa digaula ga lloomoi ga daaligi goe boo.”
